betterquesting:10.desc:8: §6Litherite§r is a crystal that can be crafted using four §6Flint§r, two §6Green Dye§r, two §6Lime Dye§r, and a §6Infused Diamond§r. It is useful in making §emachine modifiers§r, the §6Assembler§r, the §6Solar Cell§r, etc. Litherite can also be used make §5Tinkers' Construct§r tools, which has the §etrait of absorbing stone for durability§r.
